flawed_nl_solution:
He makes 20*40=$<<20*40=800>>800 per week
He used to make 16*25=$<<16*25=400>>400 per week
So his raise was 800-400=$<<800-400=4000>>4000 per week
So he makes 4000*52=$<<4000*52=208000>>208000 per year more

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 4000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
